dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Hey, Alice. How was your day?

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: Oh, it was pretty good. Thanks for asking!

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: Well, I played some games and read a book. You?

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: I was at work all day, but afterwards, I spent some time painting.

dialogues.speaker: Alice
dialogues.text: That sounds fun! I'd love to see your artwork sometime.

dialogues.speaker: John
dialogues.text: Absolutely, I'd be happy to share.
